profile.about_me: Expert professional in Sales & Business development, planning and executing business strategies, master in developing new market channels and building strong relationships with cross functional team, customers, and industry leaders. Rich experience in managing the entire gamut of activities related to Key Account Management, P & L, Operations, Sales & Distribution, RTM, Budget & Forecasting, Product launch and product promotion through direct sales and strategic alliances with domestic and international business partners.

header.lead: Information is not knowledge. The only source of knowledge is experience. You need experience to gain wisdom - Albert Einstein

educations.title: Degree - Master of Business Administration
educations.description: The MBA in marketing prepares you for more than careers in marketing. Some of the career options will include consulting, entrepreneurial careers, and general management. The marketing MBA teaches skills you use in any field. You learn skills such as mathematics, communications, analytical, and, of course, management.

educations.title: Degree - Master of Business Administration
educations.description: BSc Agriculture is a degree course in the field of agriculture and its applications. Agricultural science also has disciplines such as agronomy, horticulture, plant pathology, entomology, soil science, food technology, agricultural economics, home science, fisheries, forestry, and veterinary science.

careers.title: National Key Account Manager
careers.description: A MERN stack developer with proficiency in developing interactive and elegant user-interfaces, and high performant backends. The project undertaken include business information websites, data-scraping projects, chrome extensions, and more.

careers.title: Regional Branch Manager
careers.description: A company providing CRM and Cloud Telephony services. The job description consisted on developing a web UI for a pre-existing mobile app and integrating the web UI into the CRM's core.

careers.title: Zonal Business Manager (South & West)
careers.description: A self-founded programming institute that provides education on the basics of computer programming using Python and JavaScript. The main candidates include college students who opted for computer related courses and school students with programming subjects in their curriculum.

careers.title: Regional Sales Manager (Eastern Region)
careers.description: A multi-college premise with divisions for graduation and post-graduation degrees. The job role consisted teaching various computer science and programming subjects using theoretical and practical methods. The main task was to figure a logical and analogical yet simple way to convey knowledge of complex computer science topics to complete beginners.
